title: Was kicked from champion select and lost LP
body:
I was in champion select in the ban phase with 2 of my friends for Flex Queue, we were unable to ban a champion, and the other people in the lobby couldn't ban either. We were all punished with the loss of LP as well as the ban timer. I rarely dodge, and so this is frustrating. Thank you for any response or indication as to why this might be occurring.

EDIT: for clarification, the ban timer sat at 0 and wouldn't let us ban a champion before that

replies.body: I've seen a couple different instances of this happening between today and yesterday, but it seems like this issue should have been fixed up by the devs already. This might have been a coincidental hiccup in your network, so let's be sure to run through some of the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) juuuust in case some settings got out of whack somehow.
Okay yeah. It's just that all 3 of us are in different states and so since they also couldn't ban, I'm assuming it isn't a networking issue. Glad you guys are aware of it tho! Thanks for the reply!!!
